item.title: 7 Hills of Rome - Aventino
item.description: This drop consists of seven 1/1 NFTs captured on the seven hills on top of which, according to the legends, Rome was originally built. This moment was captured on top of Aventino hill. Name: 7 Hills of Rome, Aventino. item.title: About Atlas NFT
item.description: Atlas NFT is a project dedicated to generative art and photography. It’s main focus at the moment is The Atlas of Fleeting Moments. There will be serveral drops. Stay tuned for updates. Use the links below to follow this project also on other channels: Twitter OpenSea

item.title: Expo 2020
item.description: This drop consists of a single 1/1 NFT captured at the 2020 World Exposition held in Dubai from October 2021 to March 2022. This moment was captured at the central hub of the exposition, under the 65-meter-high dome of Al Wasl Plaza. Name: Expo 2020, Al Wasl Plaza. Original Image Unique Attributes - temperature: 26 - noise: 65 - altitude: 33 - timestamp: 1639120441000 - latitude: 24.9613978 - longitude: 55.1509770 Details - author: 0x3507b169f5c1ae40da76ceb114f1b223ae35f637 - contract: 0x2953399124F0cBB46d2CbACD8A89cF0599974963 - token_id: 23986173370145536322699012959698545426864722380502947683855894898760761737217 → buy this NFT!

These info include: Contract Address Token ID Metadata To verify you are actually buying NFTs from this project on OpenSea, once you have reached the asset page, go to the details section (see image below) and ensure that:

item.title: The Atlas of Fleeting Moments
item.description: The Atlas of Fleeting Moments is a collection of unique collectible moments in the form of 1/1 NFTs on the Polygon blockchain. Reality is ephemeral, the very fabric of what is eludes true perception and escapes trough our own fingers. The theatre staging the unfolding of this poignant story we called time. What we are left with is the opportunity to capture fleeting snapshots of our reality like fragile worlds inside tiny glass globes.
